website_summaries.verdict: The BackBeat Pro 2 is an excellent full-size wireless noise-cancelling headphone that costs nearly half as much as comparable models from Bose, Sony or Sennheiser.
pros: The Plantronics BackBeat Pro 2 sounds very good for a Bluetooth headphone, is comfortable to wear and offers decent noise cancellation and strong battery life
It performs very well as headset for making cell phone calls, includes a carrying pouch, and is an overall excellent value
cons: While the design has been improved, the headphone is still a little heavy and its aesthetics may not appeal to everyone
noise-canceling isn't quite as effective as Bose's

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Doesn’t hold up to light use.
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months of light use it has started to short out. The feature of it pausing when you lift the earpiece seems to be the cause of the shorting out. It stops, then starts, sometimes it only stops. The volume also changes going really loud and then quiet. I baby my equipment and was shocked when this started to happen.
customer_reviews.author: toubob

customer_reviews.title: At the price-point these are probably pretty good. However
customer_reviews.text: At the price-point these are probably pretty good. However, they felt plastic-y, the sound profile was bass heavy with slightly harsh highs. There seemed to be a bit of noise leakage from the cups, so even with ANC on, it wasn't killing every external noise. I returned them and I suggest looking towards a more expensive pair of headphones. I am convinced you cannot have a good set of wireless ANC cans at this price. There are too many little things that need to be right! I would love to see them take the creativity required to make a pair of wireless ANC headphones @ $100 and build an industry changing set @ $200.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Van Berg

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Ear-cushion Material
customer_reviews.text: At one year of age, the "leatherette" ear-cushions started to fall to pieces and when I look in the mirror, I have dozens of tiny black shreds all over the sides of my face. I've gone to the supermarket covered in this crap a dozen times without knowing it. Incredibly poor materials. Also, every once in a while it starts popping back and forth between mute-on and mute-off -- no discernible reason. Considering the price, these things are pitiful.
customer_reviews.author: Moresby

customer_reviews.title: Audio cut out issues
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. These worked fine for a few months then I started to have problems with the audio cutting out. It was worse when connected to more than once device at a time - a feature this product advertises. I contacted Plantronics and they said that this product was designed to work with phones and that issues with computers weren't supported. Flakey product from a company that doesn't stand behind the performance of its products.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Move over, Bose
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I love these headphones so far. Very few complaints. PROS: - Fits my big head - Super long battery - Sound is very clear/loud - Comfortable, lot of cushioning - Easily connects to Bluetooth; connection is stable with no drops/crackling - Controls on set are useful/work well - Black set has a nice look to it, more stylish than Bose CONS: - Slightly heavy - Noise-cancelling is weak - Can be a little bassy - Earcups can get hot with extended use Overall, a REALLY solid Bluetooth set for the price. Has worked perfectly in the time I've had with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Forschberr

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmm
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed bought it and recieved it. While wearing it for the first hour the volume switch stopped working. Tried turning off and on and same result with the volume. The play/pause button didnt work. Bluetooth connectivity kept dropping on and off even though i never went further then the next room. Overall the quality of materials looked very good it was comfortable to wear. Cant really say anything not the battery life cause well it didn't even take an hour before the buttons started to fail me.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Lo

customer_reviews.title: Good value at refurbished price...would look elsewhere at full price
customer_reviews.text: Sound is pretty good with noise cancelling on. With open mic on its like wearing earbuds. Some glitchy sounds when no music is playing, but not that bad. On ear controls work well with iPhone Bluetooth. I bought this for making phone calls and listening to music...audible sound is ok, caller on other end said they could hear me fine, but calls happen in open mic mode so surrounding noise is heard inline with noise canceling mode on. Bought these refurbished, which was considerably less than new price...so a good value for me. But for that reason only gave 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Headphones won't last...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I'm unable to recommend this purchase. After infrequent use and always storing these in the provided nylon travel sleeve, the material on the ear cups first split along the seam and now the ear cup themselves are disintegrating. Manufacturer fails to stand behind their product. Recommend you look elsewhere for quality noise canceling headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap feeling, not comfortable, not great sound
customer_reviews.text: Cons: -Even though these are pretty bulky, the headphone cups are shallow and touch my ears. -They look and feel pretty cheap. -The sound is decent, but not for the price. -The noise cancelling is pretty terrible too. Barely reduced the sound of the air conditioner in my office (most ANC headphones eliminate this completely). Pros: -Good Bluetooth. Paired easily and didn't lose connection. -Button layout is good, I like physical buttons
customer_reviews.author: Max E

customer_reviews.title: Use BBP2 With BT600 On PCs
customer_reviews.text: 5-star on the product itself. Headphones have been around for generations. Wireless headphones have been around for at least twenty years now. Not sure why these things are still so expensive. In order to use your BackBeat Pro 2 on PCs, you'll need a Bluetooth dongle. You can use a generic BT4.x+ USB dongle or you can use the Plantronics BT600. To pair the BBP2 with BT600, do the following: Power on computer, log into Windows (no one cares about Macs) Insert the BT600 in an open USB slot Use a paperclip to press the pin hole LIGHTLY (see picture) until the BT600 flashes red/blue Turn on the BBP2 into pairing mode Wait for the paring successful message Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Farmer Ted

customer_reviews.title: Too much automatic pausing.
customer_reviews.text: The best feature of these is also the worst. When you take the headphones off, they have sensors that pause the music. It is a really cool feature and something that I would really miss with a different pair. However, they also pause it sometimes when you don't take them off. If i am out walking, or on the train, or sometimes sitting at my desk they will just pause and unpause, either for no reason or because I slightly move my head. All in all, they are a good pair of phones, but for ~$200, I would expect better quality.
customer_reviews.author: JoeCho

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these headphones daily for nearly 9 months and I'm still impressed with the quality for the price. I've always been sort of a headphone addict. I've owned a wide assortment of brands including Bose, Beats, Sennheiser, AKG, and a whole assortment of lesser-known brands. If you're trying to determine which of the expensive brands these headphones are comparable to, I'd say they're more like Beats than Bose. They've got a meatier, forceful sound than the more subtle grace of the Bose cans, but hell, I've always been more of a Beats kind of guy anyway. For the price, there are an absolute no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Dobrow

customer_reviews.title: The battery takes forever to run down!
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable, bluetooth right on target for my phone and fire, and probably the best made headphones I've ever owned. I use them daily for about 3 to 4 hours a day and it took about ten days for me to recharge them when she said to me in the headphones, "Battery Low". Great product. These replaced an old set of mine which were also Plantronics and still work but not with my phone or Fire because they're not BT! I use those for the PC because I can't figure out how to set up bluetooth on my W7 PC! If that happens then I'll be close to heaven!
customer_reviews.author: Ed the Fred

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I thought
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this. I was looking for headphones that I could use in a loud environment to use with calls. The noise cancelation was ok. Wasn’t as good as the Bose. The auto stop on music didn’t work all the time. And the telephone conversations didn’t really go well. I wanted to be able to hear myself talk and I though active listening would help. Other people could not hear me well and I couldn’t hear myself. So wasn’t that great for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: DoesItSuck

customer_reviews.title: Boomtastic
customer_reviews.text: Everything I hoped it to be. Arrived undamaged and packaged very well. Immediately put it on charge and began using it soon after. Highs and Lows are great, and the bass, "Boomtastic"! With the Music Volume EQ+Bass Booster App created the perfect marriage for the Backbeat Pro2. Awesome headset for the money. The noise cancellation performs so well, your music takes you to a new dimension in quality. The zippers storage bag is made of strong fabric and has a nice storage pouch for your device cables. I have already watched Netflix movies and listened to my mp3 music with pure satisfaction. Now to see how long it will hold up to my daily use.
customer_reviews.author: 2Tall

customer_reviews.title: Love his headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love his headphones! Excellent feel and sounds amazing ... Made me stop using my beats and Sony ... This is my go to now and have since got rid of any other headphones .. noise cancelling works well in NYC subway .. not as great as Bose noise cancelling but it def holds its own.. the only feature I don't like and had issue with was the detection options where headphones stops music when take it off .. I found it buggy as walking around it would sometimes shut off on its own .. the great thing is you can just turn this feature off ... Overall for the price this is a steal!
customer_reviews.author: idjlalai

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound really great and feel great when wearing them. The ability to connect to multiple bluetooth devices and the ease of connecting is also a plus. Not to mention, they look really good and the cords included really add to the value of these headphones (the velvet bag included is also really nice). My only complaint is the lack of noise cancelling these headphones offer. I would say they do a decent job at best, but that might be a bit too generous. Overall, for the money, I am happy about this purchase and look forward to use them for music, gaming, etc.. I'd certainly recommend these to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Parish

customer_reviews.title: Start with the best! Buy Boise!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received these today. I am so disappointed! The sound quality is np better than a $60 pair I bought from Amazon. I hoped the upgrade to these headphones would have been an improvement! And after only 10 minutes, my ears were sweating. I read all the raving reviews and now I'm amazed as to why. I've spent low, and now low mid price-wise. It's time for Sony or Boise!
customer_reviews.author: GailJean

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but DON'T MOVE A MUSCLE
customer_reviews.text: So, these WOULD be the perfect headphones. They sound fantastic. I love the ease of the control from headphones to phone. The noise cancelling is decent (for ambience control only). Great clarity and the right amount of bass. And i like that you can turn the mic on and off. The problem is it pauses the music every freakin time to move your head rendering these headphones perfectly WORTHLESS. It drives me insane! Waking and working out, FORGET IT. Lying in bed, you better lay there perfectly still. I HATE these headphones because they're such a tease. They're both a waste of money AND quality.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are my first over-the-ear wireless headphones and I like them. I use them for my iPhone and iPad at home and when flying. The noise cancelling feature works really well on a plane and I sit in the emergency exit row on the wing where it can be quite loud. I’ve only had to charge it one other time since I’ve had it (other time being when I got them) and for me it holds up well. I’d recommend these plus I’d buy another pair if I lost them or my toddler gets his reckless hands on them.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. Easy to control
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Easy to control. Pairing is fast. Delivery fast. Nice soft case. Features I like: Forwarding of videos & music. Mic mute. Volume control ring. On-Off switch. Pause control. Battery life is great. The only thing missing is a balance control...or I've not found it yet. Haven't played with the sound dampening controls yet. I've paired it to my I-pad and Android phone, both were ultra-smooth and easy. Thought about doing it to my car but really don't need to do that. :) I've only had these for about a week. Will review again after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Left Head Fred

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a month
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for 3 weeks, then started having minor sound issues. I thought it was just my friend's microphone being poor, but the problems progressively got worse, until a little after a month (right after the return window closes, what a coincidence), the left ear blew out and stopped working properly. Amazon won't take the product back, and Plantronic's "warranty" requires you to pay to send them back the product, and they'll probably just send me another broken product so I'll have to send it back again. Scam.
customer_reviews.author: abcd

customer_reviews.title: Not for relaxing
customer_reviews.text: Some little gripes about these headphones. First the big call button on the right side is not very useful and just gets in the way. Second the headphones have this weird feature that is sometimes cool and sometimes a pain in the neck which is when you take the headphones off the music stops but it's also finicky and if I go to rest my neck it will just think I'm taking off my headphones so if your trying to watch tv while laying down definitely do not get these. This is when I pair them wireless with my apple TV and firetv to watch Netflix, YouTubetv, Hulu, showtime, Disney+, or Amazon prime movies.
customer_reviews.author: Peyton

customer_reviews.title: Great features, Decent noise cancelling.
customer_reviews.text: Not the best when it comes to noise cancelling. But chock full of features that I do like. It is corded and has Bluetooth and I have not yet found a pair that has both at this price range. The sound is good and they are well designed. In a nutshell, buy if you don't need top notch Bose noise cancelling, but want good sound, decent noise cancelling and a bunch of other useful features.
customer_reviews.author: Kb

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Returned them as the feature that pauses your music when you remove the headphones was all messed up. Every single time I moved my head the music would pause and then un pause with the following move. Truly a fatal flaw for headphones if this price point. Also the noise canceling was non existent.
customer_reviews.author: adrian

customer_reviews.title: I like the way I can plug in or use bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are incredible - they meet or exceed all (more expensive) competitor headphones in their sound quality and abilities to block noise. I like the way I can plug in or use bluetooth, and I can take calls or listen to someone talk to me by turning on a microphone. They are also very attractive and great for smaller heads and ears.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great performance,  fair price
customer_reviews.text: These things work great. Incredible sound, comfort, and overall performance. Sound dampening is good and is a nice feature. You can also easily disable sound dampening if needed with a push of a button (like when the flight attendants interrupt to take a drink order). I also like the auto stop feature that pauses your movie or song when headphones are removed. Nice touch which can also be disabled if you prefer. Overall I'm very glad I chose these over comparable brands that can run 2x as much. As with other reviews, consider a separate $30 hard case sold elsewhere on Amazon in lieu of the bag provided with the Plantronics.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: great features, so so noise canceling
customer_reviews.text: Great for home office. love the fact that it pairs with my pc and phone at the same time. use for conference calls, speak recognition software, and of course music. I have paired with 2 Samsung tv's (9500 and 8700) both work flawlessly and sound is clear. I have found the nose canceling is almost non exsitant. That being said, I am thrilled with the purchase. The ear pads feel better after you break them in, a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: D Hennel

customer_reviews.title: Power House, Premium Feel @ Low Cost.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent buy for the price. :) I was struggling to find something that offers all the features of a premium headset but is not burn my wallet. This headset features put-it-on-play-take-it-off-pause, open mic to hear outside sounds / noises. This is very effective when I am on a call and have a person near-by talking about something related. This is a perfect buy for office space. Also, a commendable feature is the battery, this is a powerhouse offering >20 hours battery with noise cancelling turned off, and >16 hours with noise cancelling turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Aswinkumar

customer_reviews.title: Since these sound and function great the price savings outweighs the bulkiness
customer_reviews.text: The only downside to these headphones is that they don't collapse as small as the Beats or Bose and they are a little more bulky. However, I still gave them 5 stars because they are 1/2 the price of the Bose and $100 cheaper than the Beats 3. Since these sound and function great the price savings outweighs the bulkiness, so I gave it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: elmattTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic headphones. I waited a few months to write any kind of review to make sure I still felt as good about them after some time had passed, and I do. I like to wear headphones at work and these have always been comfortable for nearly all-day use. Sound quality is great. I LOVE that I can simultaneously connect multiple devices, and the fact that they pause your music when you take them off your ears is genius. Battery life is also great, I usually only charge them every couple of weeks despite frequent usage. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tara N Brewster

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: I'd give these a 5 star rating, but I think they need a little redesign on the ear pieces to make them more comfortable. Only my 2nd pair of ( relatively cheap ) Bluetooth headphones with ANC that I've ever tried, so i'm not an expert. ANC seems to work pretty well. Music quality is nice also. They sound better ( and noise cancelling feature is better ) than another pair that I tried in the same price range. They link up very quickly and i'm amazed at how well the phone feature works. I wouldn't hesitate to buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: R. Culp

customer_reviews.title: Great sound with occasional hiccups
customer_reviews.text: Travel with these things frequently and they are great for blocking out the noise of mass transit. Not too much bass and decent mid-range sound. My only complaints would be: 1) I can hear the buttons rattle a bit when walking with these on 2) If i yawn, take a drink, or other random head movements, it'll often temporarily pause what I'm listening to 3) Regardless of device I'm connected to over Bluetooth, sound will cut out every few minutes for just a fraction of a second
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am a super light sleeper and now I can sleep
customer_reviews.text: These have changed my life! I am a super light sleeper and now I can sleep. YES I sleep in these every night. And now going to a hotel with my husband doesn't mean being sleep deprived! You have to try these to believe the difference they make!
customer_reviews.author: cmbs

customer_reviews.title: Comfy fit but unreliable controls
customer_reviews.text: I used this on both mac and iPhone and a Samsung stereo system, all in Bluetooth mode. I found the controls are very unreliable, they would cut in and out of noise cancelling, and start and stop on its own, making it impossible to listen to music for any length of time. Trying to control it from the phone, the control would fight with the buttons on the headphones. I was happy about the fit and the carrying case but that was the only thing that was good about it. I expected more for that money.
customer_reviews.author: A.H.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy. I would be asking for a refund if I could.
customer_reviews.text: Constantly gives me problems. Disconnects at random times or if there is no sound for a few seconds. Just shut itself off and restarted 3 times in a row for no reason.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these on sale for $133 on amazon. These are amazing for the price. The noise cancellation future is the best part. No more noisy neighbors. I wish the bass was higher but you can't complain with the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones, just a little to much bass
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much. I have owned many pairs of Bluetooth over ear headphones and these are my favorite by far. They have great sound canceling and for the price absolutely amazing sound quality. They are extremely comfortable, can’t believe they fit my giant head. My only complaint is there is to much bass. You can adjust er to make it better but for me it’s just a little overwhelming but not enough to make me dislike them or return them. At the end of the day for the price you can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Fungi-man

customer_reviews.title: Great value in Bluetooth Noise cancelation headphones
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are used every day at work. It drowns out the "white noise" of the overhead fans of the cooling/heating duct. I have used the headphones on business trips - airplanes. Works great. Love that I have two devices attached (iPod touch and Android phone) Listening to music and I get a phone call it interrupts the music and I can answer call. After call ends I am back to the same place in the music.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Frechette

customer_reviews.title: The padding falls apart.
customer_reviews.text: Warning to those who purchase. I've worn these for long periods since I've purchased them. The sound quality is good and they still work, however the material padding around the ears fell apart not long after purchase. I called Plantronics customer service and was essentially told I was "out of luck." Evidently, poor workmanship used in construction. They may have solved the problem. Not sure. I will probably be purchasing another brand when I change.
customer_reviews.author: Will V.

customer_reviews.title: I really want to like it and keep it
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great, tight, crisp, immersive Love the features, lift to pause, dedicated mute button, dedicated prev/pause/next buttons (except volume dial is a bit diff to use) looks premium, feels premium I used it in a 6 hour flight, the ANC was really a life saver, huge difference. however, I had to return it, the ear cups are just too shallow, not deep enough, the sides of my ears are pressed against the non-soft materials in the construct, after a couple hours, it becomes uncomfortable that I had to constantly adjust it to find a better position. I hope Plantronics fix that design issue (and make it a bit lighter), I use other Plantronics for conference calls, love their headphones
customer_reviews.author: cyberguest

customer_reviews.title: My favorite pair of Bluetooth headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the Bluetooth headphones I tried out, these hit the sweet spot on sound quality, features, battery life, and feel. They're comfortable, not too heavy, have incredible sound, and the controls are pretty intuitive. While the Bose QC35s have a slightly more impressive soundstage and better Active Noise Canceling... I think at less than half the cost, these are a steal. I do not regret these at all... if I were to upgrade from these, I'd look to a >500 dollar pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: DJKTenX

customer_reviews.title: . . . hmmm, why me?
customer_reviews.text: It sounds like everyone has plastic over their mouths when they are talking or trying to talk out of a kazoo. This has little to no bass and these headphones don't really get loud. . . I miss my crushers from skull candy, it rumbled my bass bones Oh on the plus, this was amazing unboxing experience . . . normally don't care about such things. .. but this pleased me greatly. . .
customer_reviews.author: DasMalkavian

customer_reviews.title: Great features, great sound, great price
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a good set of headphones for the price range. I was very pleasantly surprised by how easy-to-use these are. I have used other products in the past, and this was very intuitively designed, particularly compared to the other headphones. These are very comfortable. Good padding around the ears and head. They work at a surprisingly long distance as well - I was able to have uninterrupted music at about 75 feet (I didn't try any farther than that). Definitely would recommend to those seeking cheaper alternatives but still wanting a high-quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: At this price, Nothing else comes close.
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal sound, better than expected noise cancellation and great style/fit. No other heaphone is going to hit all these marks at this price point. I have the original backbeat pro's as well, 2 years old and sound great. Only upgraded because I'm using the old pair as a full time gaming headset. It also doesn't hurt that the new set look 100X better than the OG's. 10/10 for the BP2's
customer_reviews.author: Chris F.

customer_reviews.title: Okay for music bad for silence.
customer_reviews.text: Sub par noise cancellation. I’ve used headsets without noise cancelling that were comparable. The noise cancelling only seems to work if you put some form of audio, like white noise or music, through the speakers. If you just want silence then these don’t even come close. Music sounded good through them. Nothing out of this world but no major complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Gaaaaaaaaaard

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have been nothing but trouble. They won’t connect to a phone without muting the microphone (you can’t speak). I can’t play anything from a device for more than a microsecond before it pauses. Tried on multiple devices same thing. Other headphones work fine. The company cannot figure it out or help me. Replaced once under warranty and this second pair just went in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Sclafani

customer_reviews.title: Beats the Bose and not the bank
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones for the price. Excellent sound quality and battery life. This product lasts for weeks on a single charge. The noise cancelation is so-so. If you’re looking for a cost-effective alternative for Bose, I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: tboe

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, fits big heads, amazing audio quality
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a fan of plantronics, whether it's work headsets, gaming headsets or for music, they never disappoint. Same goes for this, after losing my original backbeat pro, I decided to get these ones, and the oval ear cushions, which are super comfy works wonders on my big ears, and it fits my giant head. Audio quality is great and the active noise cancelling feature works really well on my long 10 hour flights to Denmark. Built quality is rugged bug flexible so I'm not worried about tossing them around. For the price, you simply cant go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bisgaard

customer_reviews.title: The Greatest
customer_reviews.text: To hell with the overpriced BEATS. I bought these for my boyfriend for his birthday and he's been ranting and raving about how much he loves them. The one day I decided to see what all the hype was about, so he put them on me and played music and WOW. You can hear EVERY SINGLE LITTLE THING, so clear, so vivid, but not overwhelming. The design is light and sleek, and it's neat that you can use it as a communicative device with your cell phone. He loves it, and so did I.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Danko

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as Bose and half the price
customer_reviews.text: I own a pair of noise canceling Bose and have used Bose for the past 10 years. These are just as good (if not better), and are much cheaper. Sound is fantastic, maybe not quite as good as Bose, but everything else is better. You won't be disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. Potter

customer_reviews.title: These are crazy awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Noice cancelling is great, Bass response is pretty sweet, especially for the price, and the Bluetooth works great. One note, hook up to one source at a time, when hooked up to both my phone and my laptop, which it does automatically, it sometimes stutters, once you disconnect one source, it works great. Bluetooth works great for phone calls too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harper

customer_reviews.title: Comfy / Great Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with battery life. Noise cancelling is good (not great after trying the Bose QC35) and does the job on a plane. Sound quality is top notch. Very comfy - wore them for 13 hours straight on a Newark - Beijing flight.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S

customer_reviews.title: Terrible noise cancelation
customer_reviews.text: There are 2 modes for noise cancelation. Open Mike on Open Mike off Noise cancelation on I don't see any student between open Mike of (which I assume is noise cancelation off) and noise cancelation on. Active voice on, completely stops the audio and amplifies external volume I don't know if it is a problem with my device or do others have the same feedback
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: The signal shorts out
customer_reviews.text: After an extended period of time listening (2-3hrs) the sound starts to flicker in and out. It was almost like it couldn't decide which input signal to use. I tried restarting and it continued. I had it plugged into an entertainment unit. Unfortunately, I had to send them back as they were unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Bolsen

customer_reviews.title: Great all around headphones for those that like that cinematic sound
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these sound.... it’s rich it’s 3D it’s bass heavy it very good at blocking out the noise ... it sounds like a cinema when I watch movies .... critical review ... a little weak in the mids and approaching tinny on the highs... but I enjoy these very much. The Bluetooth does have a lag with videos .. but other than that I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Mo headphones

customer_reviews.title: Sound is great, but too many problems
customer_reviews.text: When you take off the head phones, it stops audio. Sometimes it wouldn't get back on until unplugged/re-plugged. Also, after about 3 weeks I started getting a high clicking sound which hurt my ears. You can only do mic or sound, not both. Other than those issues, they were great to use and very comfortable. The battery life was much more than advertised. I used for days before I had to recharge.
customer_reviews.author: Corinna Kaberlein

customer_reviews.title: The microphone functionality does not work properly.
customer_reviews.text: This item was described as having a microphone that I could use for calls but the clients on the other end could barely hear me no matter how much I troubleshooted the issue. I primarily use my headphones for client calls while I am traveling or in transit which is quite frequently. I was severely disappointed in this product after attempting to troubleshoot and try them out for 2 months. I wish that it were not too late to return these headphones and try a different set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: almost magic!
customer_reviews.text: unless your gonna get the top of the line sony's and spend two to three times as much, i don't think you could do better. this are extremely nice head phones!!! great noise canceling and very well designed. battery lasts forever. couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: teichenseer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought plenty of headphones in my life and these headphones unbelievable great noise cancellation Great Sound volume control they have some weight to them but these are the best pair of headphones I've ever bought I was skeptical about buying them used but when I receive them you couldn't even tell I would definitely recommend these headphones to somebody that's looking for a pair close to Bose QuietComfort
customer_reviews.author: Jason B.

customer_reviews.title: Very good bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: The audio quality on these is honestly phenomenal and is a huge step up from anything similarly priced. The mids are crisp and the bass is super impactful. Similarly, the build quality of the headset is fantastic and also feels comfortable after several hours of use; it's not fragile but will feel like a pillow on your head The battery life is also incredible and lasts for far longer than I anticipated, making it my go to for long trips
customer_reviews.author: Dallas H.

customer_reviews.title: Spend the money for an upgrade
customer_reviews.text: ANC does not compare to the qc35 I tried them back to back and unfortunately it is actually worth paying the extra $130 for the Bose qc35. Aside from the poor ANC, these are also very small over ears and rest on the ear too much I like the Bose better because it seems to block more than just background, also stopping voices and such which is ideal for an office
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: Shallow Earcups
customer_reviews.text: The other reviews on these headphones are accurate, and I really liked these headphones. The sound was great and I was perfectly happy with the controls, pairing and noise cancellation. I give these 3 stars, however, because the earcups are really too shallow. Over ear headphones often press on my ears but these did so much more than others. Had to return these for a Sony set instead. If most headphones fit you well I would recommend these, but otherwise beware.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Cans!
customer_reviews.text: I did quite a bit of research for ANC Bluetooth headphones. Are there better ones out there? Yes, for twice the price. I am super happy with these headphones. The price point is great, and it delivers solidly over all categories including sound, battery life, and isolation. It can hook up with 2 Bluetooth devices at a time and the battery life is outstanding. I won't gush any more, be confident that they are wonderful and well worth the $$$!
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Great for me, not always great for who I'm on the phone with
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are comfortable. The cushions are soft and cozy. They don't slip however they can get sweaty when exercising. One interesting feature I learned, the open mic is very sensitive. I could hear people having a conversation in another room. The only downside is that sometimes when I'm on the phone the mic picks up too much of my surroundings.
customer_reviews.author: Jesselyn J.

customer_reviews.title: They're well built with decent audio
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to help me focus. I just needed to block out the negatives around me. I was mildly disappointed. The noise cancelation works moderately well but I can still hear my wife and children. Their constant whining can still be heard with noise cancelation. All I hear is "I need a snack" and "I think we need to spend some time apart" completely ruining my best of the 90's bops. Worth it if you can find them on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewinator

customer_reviews.title: Really Good
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have surprisingly good sound! I’m very picky about audio quality and had fairly low expectations from a wireless headphone. I have to say I was amazed at the sound quality of these headphones. Great warm sound, strong bass good comfort, great battery life!
customer_reviews.author: Ezgoin

customer_reviews.title: Noice cancellation is zero - but sound is excellent
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty happy with the purchase, but if noise cancelation was what I was after I would be very disappointed. The audio is really good, and the battery life is great. It does struggle with Bluetooth hesitation - is that a thing? I may have just made it up - when I am connected to my computer and am using it, it will crackle and stop playing intermittently as I use the programs on my computer, but if I connect it to my phone then it works great.
customer_reviews.author: W. Whitesides

customer_reviews.title: These were a great price for a pair of quality entry level "luxury" ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Plantronics I have owned and I am loving them. These were a great price for a pair of quality entry level "luxury" headphones. The Bluetooth connectivity works until around 60 feet away (in a house with lead painted walls) which is impressive by any feat. The sound quality is amazing. The noise cancellation works however not as well as the Bose I have used in the past. All in all, great product that I will purchase again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Allison

customer_reviews.title: Good for music, not the best for use with soft phones.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product. Noise canceling works well in the office setting. Can simultaneously tether 2 devices. Decent smart controls. Marked down because of comparability issues with Windows making it unable to be used wirelessly via Bluetooth with Skype. Not covered by plantronics telephony control software. Not a good choice for office soft phone use.
customer_reviews.author: Sean L. Simon

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I have owned so far. I love absolutely everything about them. I was concerned based on other reviews about the sound quality. I agree that music is a bit bass heavy compared to other headphones, but I enjoy EDM so it is awesome. Battery life let’s me listen to about 2-3 hours a day for a week before needing to recharge.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great Sounding Headpones
customer_reviews.text: I have owned these headphones for over 2 weeks now and remain thoroughly satisfied with their performance. A reasonably priced alternative to more expensive noise cancelling headphones, I like the overall sound. As a person who likes pronounced but not overwhelming bass, these meet my criteria. There are better noise cancelling headphones on the market, but if you are using these primarily in a home environment as I do, these do a great job of quieting external sounds while listening. They have tremendous battery life. They're not the most aesthetically pleasing ones out there, but for the price I give them very high marks.
customer_reviews.author: nathj

customer_reviews.title: Glitchy bluetooth and non existent noice cancellation.
customer_reviews.text: The software is incredibly glitchy. If you play a game while listening to song, there's no telling when the game/song gets disconnected and only on ends up playing. I have pretty big ears so this might be a problem for everyone but the FIT IS ABSOLUTELY UNWEARABLE for more than an hour at max. It pressed on your years and my ear lobes get noticably red after an hour listening.....it's not fun. I don't hate many electronics product I've bought but I sure hate these. The sound quality is better then my $50 ath-m20x but that's not setting a very high bar. Skip these if you care for noice cancellation or glitch free software or a comfortable wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look for Something else
customer_reviews.text: It's nice looking and solid. It has good battery life and I like the interface with my Samsung S9 Bluetooth. But the problem with it is it keeps cutting off and reconnecting with my Bluetooth which gives skipping sound, it's very irritating. I would return it if I had the box, there are other better brand choices to get with the amount money paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Xylem

customer_reviews.title: Annoying smart sensors
customer_reviews.text: They sound great and battery life is very long. My major issues with them are smart sensors. I’ll be working and then they decide to think they are not in my head so the music cuts off. Then you have to reset the sensors and it’s annoying. I would prefer to turn them off and I can control the music manually. Lastly, when using them as a head set on phone calls the quality is terrible, the people on the other side can’t hear me. This is strange because they work great when in a WebEx meeting.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle Muresan

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, bad connectivity
customer_reviews.text: I purchased around 8 months ago and i'd like to share my experiences with this headphone: The sound quality is excelent, on par with other high end headphones, very good battery. But.... Using it with a laptop is such a pain, it makes weird noice all the time, can't even watch a full movie properly without switching to wired mode. The auto pause function is bad, sometimes it randomly pauses out of no where (when i slightly turned my head). This ruined the experience for me *Updated* Got a replacement but the issues persist nonetheless. Though an usb dongle solved the issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Viet Anh Cu

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Best bluetooth headphone for the price. Yes there are better ones out there, but not at this price. The noise cancelling is weaker than expected, but again, at this price range, there isn't anything better.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Good quality  GREAT BATTERY LIFE
customer_reviews.text: GREAT battery life ! They could lighten up on the weight of the build a little. Not crazy about the brown but they were the cheapest at the time, BLACK GOES WITH EVERYTHING! The noise canceling doesn't really effect the music quality like some say, it's hardly a noticeable difference when activated. The open mic feature is nice !
customer_reviews.author: Jake M.

customer_reviews.title: Headphones stuttered
customer_reviews.text: I liked the sound from these, but they stuttered a bit. Sound would intermittently stop for a moment, then restart, as if the Bluetooth connection was not solid. Other Bluetooth headphones do not exhibit this behavior in my environment. These have a feature where they pause when removed from your head. Even with that disabled, I still had the stuttering problem. These weren't quite comfortable enough to justify replacing them, so I've simply returned them.
customer_reviews.author: T. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Best Bank for Your Buck.
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on how to get the most bank for my buck when it comes to noise canceling blue tooth headphones. i travel a lot an I also like that these headphones can become wired and plug into an airplane's entertainment system and still give me the noise canceling effect. These are great and I would recommend them to anyone. I would also add that they are cheaper than the competitors and offer comparable performance.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas SanchezMandery

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, feel and look but a poor mic
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted these to work. I travel a lot for work and use headphones for both listening to music, movies, podcasts and talking on the phone. The feel on these were great, they sounded really good, I liked the way they looked but no one could hear me when I tried to use them to hold conversations. Sadly, that is just as important to me as the sound quality. I will returning and continuing my search for quality headphone that doesn't break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not good if you are moving around...
customer_reviews.text: These have good sound. Unfortunately, they only really work when you are sitting perfectly still. I bought these so that I could listen to music while working in my shop. They are so top-heavy that they keep slipping every time I move. Then the sound cuts out. OK - if you are just sitting at a computer, but if you are wearing them while moving, they are really annoying.
customer_reviews.author: a real person who writes honest reviews

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality and comfort. Noise cancelling is not good enough, but I do not care. I do recommend this product. I am a enthusiast audiophile and I am really impressed by this product. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo

customer_reviews.title: Clear sound; great look
customer_reviews.text: I go through headphones rather quickly, but I haven't purchased a Bluetooth set yet; that is, until this one from Plantronics. The sound is excellent and it comfortably fits my ears. Sometimes, the sound is inconsistent when using the mic during a phone call, but it doesn't happen all the time. It's a pretty reliable headset. If you want crisp sound while listening to music, this is a great pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Soto

customer_reviews.title: high quality
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable, great sound quality noise cancelation is ok, but not top notch. when using for phone calls, the passive noise cancellation separates you from your surrounding in a way that you don't hear your own voice well (some would say it's a good thing, for me - not so good)
customer_reviews.author: Elad

customer_reviews.title: They make music heavenly
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have only one flaw, totally and completely uncomfortable after a while and sleeping in them-NOT possible.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Banks

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat these at the price point.
customer_reviews.text: I think these are incredibly underrated. Noise canceling is amazing. I fly frequently and these cut out all inflight related noise. Also, these hold a charge incredibly long; they have never left me in an airport struggling to get a preflight charge.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding headphones!
customer_reviews.text: These are easily the best sounding headphone I have owned. I did a lot of research prior to this purchase, and it definitely paid off. The sound is amazing and battery life is very good. I have owned high end headphones in the past, but none have compared to these.
customer_reviews.author: Dave T

customer_reviews.title: Love them. Recommended for audiophiles on a budget.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Great, full sound with awesome range and tonal separation. Excellent bass. Sound cancelling works very well, and battery last forever. Only down side is the Bluetooth microphone for phone calls, which never seems to really work. Then again, I didn’t get these to make phone calls, so it doesn’t bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Hank T.

customer_reviews.title: REALLY good sound-accurate bass-decent noise cancelling-aptx/low latency bluetooth-mute button
customer_reviews.text: Insanely great and balanced sound. Great 20hr battery life. Best headphones I’ve ever had. Better than the airpods pro. Only issue is the mic doesn’t work great in loud environments. I’ve somehow gotten used to the fit so my ears don’t hurt. These are my daily driver but I have the airpods pro for phone calls on the road or in noisy places.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew P. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: So I took these in best buy and compared to all theirs. These were better. So on your phone I'd suggest adjusting the bass to be more. But the quality is great , comfortable after long wear. Bluetooth works perfect. Easy to use. You cant beat the price for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Lesa Stutts

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are far better sounding then my Beats Studio 3 headphones which I used to think sounded better than other similar priced headphones. The quality is top notch from the actual speakers to the stitching on the headband padding. It also has a microphone setting so you hear all your surroundings amplified so you don’t have to take them off to hear people talk or to hear surrounding noises. Even the bag that comes with them to store them in is high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I use these for mowing the lawn
customer_reviews.text: They work great. Sound is great. Noise cancellation is good. Battery lasts for ever. No Bluetooth issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ethic

customer_reviews.title: Great head set
customer_reviews.text: I think these are great for the price. They are a little basey but I like that. I bot primarily for teleconference calls. They work great. Battery life is excellent. Listening to music was my second reason for purchase, but they soon became my go tos for music & long calls.
customer_reviews.author: G.Lucia

customer_reviews.title: Everything you could possible want.
customer_reviews.text: bought these for my father, the battery lasted for 2 transatlantic flights (14 hours in total) and still had life in them. noise cancelling is perfect, sound quality is perfection. calling and bluetooth works great. very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Vlad

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking at a quality headphone buy the Plantronics.
customer_reviews.text: Traveled throughout Europe on planes and trains and had no problem. Battery life was very good, sound was excellent, noise cancelling was good. Also switching to leaving head phones on to talk was a great convenience. They travel well in the and fit in the complimentary bag. I looked at Bose, Sony and Dr Dre’s and for the price I chose Plantronics as the quality was good but not as good as the others. I am very happy that I purchased the Plantronics.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Gargotta

customer_reviews.title: The non stop click-clack of this horrible device was driving me closer to a homicidal rage ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my office has an open floor plan and my neighbor inconsiderately uses a mechanical keyboard at work. The non stop click-clack of this horrible device was driving me closer to a homicidal rage every day. But the noise cancelling on these headphones reduced the racket to a normal typing sound and I no longer feel the desire to smash the keyboard over my co-worker's head. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Revell

customer_reviews.title: Not my liking
customer_reviews.text: Decent headphones......not really better than cheaper headphones. The sensors stopped the headphones from working when id remove the headphones from my ears. Nothing spectacular about pro 2. Not worth the price in my opinion. i returned these and bought Ghostek headphones for $100 cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: kiwi

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Until I tried on the Sony WH 1000xm2 I was pretty much sold. But the WH 1000xm2 didn't work out of the box, so I still rock these. I like them so much I'm thinking about keeping them as a backup
customer_reviews.author: kidfunkadelic

customer_reviews.title: Blessed Quiet on the Plane Ride
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these headphones. It took a bit to learn the switches - even with the directions. The volume control is awkward - but it works. What I really like is both the bluetooth and the plug-in options. The voice with the status report is helpful when you take them on and off. The battery lasts a very long time - and the white noise feature is a blessed relief. Got off the plane both times with a sense of peace in my head instead of the normal roar of plane travel. I would highly recommend for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce in Virginia

product_meta.title: Plantronics Wireless Noise Cancelling Backbeat - Headphones (Black & Tan) (Pro 2)
product_meta.description: Plantronics BackBeat PRO 2 - Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones (Black & Tan). Operating and storage temperature - 0 to 40 degree celsius.
feature_bullets: Audio quality: immersive, high res sound, and powerful speaker drivers deliver the right balance of rich bass, crisp highs, and natural mid tones for your music
Active Noise Cancelling (ANC): Switch on active noise cancelling (ANC) to minimize ambient noise while working or traveling
24 Hour streaming/ listen Longer: enjoy upto 24 hours of wireless music, movies and calls before choosing the cabled connection or recharging
Wireless freedom: stream rich, lifelike audio upto 100 meters/330 feet away from your class 1 bluetooth smartphone or tablet
Travel sleeve: Ear cups swivel flat to slip into the protective nylon travel sleeve; Frequency response: 20 to 20,000 Hz

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,485 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: ^BackBeat PRO 2 headphones^micro-USB charge cable^3.5mm cable^travel sleeve
